string-array.name: P_no_option
string-array.item: I could not find any available option.
No option there, as far as I can tell.

string-array.name: P_no_parking
string-array.item: I could not find any available parking.
No parking there, as far as I can tell.

string-array.name: cannotCallPhrases
string-array.item: I\'m afraid these guys are too low tech for that.
Oops, looks like they prefer to remain off line.
I wish I could, but these guys are so 20th century!

string-array.name: foundOptionPhrases
string-array.item: Here are some parking choices for you.
I found a few parking choices.
I found a few parking destinations.

string-array.name: helpHints
string-array.item: Did you notice my new floating button? It\'s always at your fingertips, and you can also stow it under the edge of your screen until you need it.
Did you know that you can text my funny jokes or smart quotes to your friends or share them on Facebook?
Did you know you can ask me for cheap gas in your area?
You can always ask me to switch to a male voice and back.
If you\'d like, I can show you the map in the satellite mode. Just ask me or make a long press on the map.
You can ask me, What\'s new on my Facebook feed? Among other things.
If you ask me for traffic to home or work, I can offer tips based on current conditions.
Did you know that I can read your new emails and messages out loud as you go?
Did you know I could deliver top news headlines?
To listen to text messages as they arrive, just check "read SMS instantly" in my settings!
Oh, you can ask me to update your Facebook status. Just so all your friends see how cool you are!
Oh, I can read your twitter feed to you, while you are focused on the important stuff.
Did you know I could fetch your daily horoscope, if you ever felt like it?
You can ask me for funny or spicy jokes. And if you like them, I can share them for you on Facebook.
To get your morning started, ask me for a motivation quote any day!
Craving some spaghetti? Ask me for the best Italian restaurant around!
Looking for parking? Just ask me to help!
Seen my floating button yet? Always at your fingertips and easy to stow under the edge of your screen until you need it.
Planning on exercising tonight? Ask me to remind you and make no excuses!
Seriously, you should teach me where your home and work are. Just say, my home is at such and such place!
Did you know that I can quickly fetch local movie showtimes?
Is it snowing in Moscow? Admit it, you’re curious.
You know, I’m thinking of becoming an English major. I have some favorite poems that I’d love to recite to you personally!
Have you seen my widget? On top of being a quick shortcut, it can tell you my trending jokes!

string-array.name: launchNavPhrases
string-array.item: Launching navigation, If you need me, just wave hello!
Starting navigation, Just wave hello if you miss me!
Launching navigation, I\'ll be on stand by if you need me.

string-array.name: occupancyPhrases
string-array.item: , It looks like the occupancy should be
, It appears the occupancy should be
, I\'d say the competition is likely
, I suspect the occupancy to be

string-array.name: sayOnStart
string-array.item: I\'ve improved my texting skills: now you can send long messages and edit them by voice. Try me!
You can ask me to Turn on flashlight.

string-array.name: sent_prepare_to_read
string-array.item: Sent you a text message, please wait, let me read it to you .. .. .. .. .. The message reads:
Sent you a text message, I am going to read it to you in just a moment .. .. .. .. .. The message reads:
Sent you a text message, just a moment, let me fetch it .. .. .. .. .. The message reads:
Sent you a text message, let\'s see what it says, just a second .. .. .. .. .. The message reads:

string-array.name: trafficIntelPhrases
string-array.item: Sending my spies to check the road conditions...
Deploying my agents to gather road observations...
Checking my sources and running the numbers...
Let me put my intelligence network to use for you...
Let me check the roads and run the numbers...

string-array.name: trafficIntelPhrasesOld
string-array.item: Sending my spies to check the road conditions... Tun duh dun tun, tun duh dun!
Deploying my agents to gather road observations... This won\'t take long... One, two, three, and...
Checking my sources... Almost there, let me run the numbers now... Hmm...
Gathering field intelligence... Oh my, so much data, so little time! Anyway, here we go:
Let me put my intelligence network to use for you... Hmm, where is that report now?.. Oh I think I got it...
Scanning road conditions... A-ha... Running the numbers now... Almost there...
Let me check the roads. There\'s time enough, but none to spare. Oh good, looks like I\'m almost there ...

string-array.name: welcomePhrases
string-array.item: Good ${partofday}, ${username}! Whether it\'s serious tasks or jokes, I am at your service.
Hi there ${username}! Oh this is going to be fun!
Hello ${username}! What are we doing today?
Hello ${username}! What are we doing today?
Welcome back ${username} - I\'m ready for you!

resources.string: Oops, someone give me my network connection back!
This application requires external storage to work.
. I could not find any. Shall we try something else?
Oopsie, I am already speaking with a female voice
Obviously, I am already speaking with a male voice
You need Android 2.3 or higher to do this.
This feature is not yet supported for your device. Please check back soon.
Would you like to have a quick shortcut to me up in system tray?
Would you like to use Waze as your default navigator?
As you wish. You can always change your selection in my settings.
Swell, setting Waze as your default navigator. You can always change that in my settings.
Custom voices are not yet available for your Android version.
I don\'t know where you are.
Sorry, I couldn\'t understand you. Here you can write your message.
Нет так нет, это можно сделать и позднее из моих настроек.
Looks like you speak Russian. Скачать русский голос, чтобы общаться по-русски?
Есть, процесс пошел! Скоро сможем болтать вовсю!
Do you mind if I download the voice?
Ok, you can always download it later from my settings.
Do you mind if I download an extra voice, to spice things up a bit?
Thank you, it will be downloaded shortly. To put it to use, ask me about latest news in just a bit.
. You should enable location sharing in your twitter settings to add a map to your tweet.
I don\'t know where that is. Please, enter another address.

Please turn on your GPS to get or share your exact location.
Ok, I did reset your facebook credentials
Here are your personal news provided by Robin ... \n
Please turn on your GPS to let me look around You.

Oh boy, you do not have it installed. You can go to my settings and download it
Ok, let me check. You didn\'t tell me it before. Please insert your birthday here.
Latest updates from Robin\'s news room ...
I don\'t know what to retweet.
. I cannot tell your current location. Please check your GPS settings.

Sorry, I got confused. Again, what kind of content are we talking about?

Oops, Something went wrong... Please, try again later.
there is already such event in the calendar.

To ask a question, just press the microphone or wave your hand twice in front and above the screen. Here are a few examples of what you could ask.
To ask a question, just press the microphone. Here are a few examples of what you could ask.
continue dictation or say: delete, send, cancel

there is no selected object to describe .

From now on I\'ll be popping up silently and listen to you first, instead of talking. If you want me to greet you every time, you can change that in my settings.

Press the back key again to cancel texting.
Please provide your feedback to my parents.
Robin - your personal assistant on the road
Sorry, I\'ve not found such contact in your phonebook. Please, select a contact manually and I will learn.
Please choose manually and I will learn it.

. Do you really want to go that far?
I am Robin\'s floating button. Move me around or stow me under the edge of your screen. Tap me for quick access.
I forgot all that you had taught me
Should I forget all your teaching?
Thanks. New question and answer saved.
Please say the phrase you want to teach me
I couldn\'t translate now. Let\'s try again later.
Car mode is On. Call and text alerts enabled
Really close Robin panel? This will disable the floating button too!
Button hand waving activation is Off
Button hand waving activation is On
If you would like to restore it, go to Robin\'s settings
SMS and call alerts are On
I have troubles with my voice download, a system voice will be used.
. Would you like to go back?

Hello! I am Robin, your personal assistant on the road. I am here to aid you with directions, parking, weather, traffic, local places and lots of other good stuff. Also, I am learning to do more as I go. Just press the microphone any time or wave your hand twice in front and above the screen, and I\'ll be at your service. I feel this is a beginning of a magnificent friendship!

I am Robin, your personal assistant on the road. I am here to aid you with directions, parking, weather, traffic, local places and lots of other good stuff. Also, I am learning to do more as I go. Just press the microphone any time or wave your hand twice in front and above the screen, and I\'ll be at your service. I feel this is a beginning of a magnificent friendship!
Which one? How about a specific instruction like,
OK to go get it from the cloud now?
OK to go get it from the cloud again?
This is Robin: I am listening

------
Sent via Robin, my eyes-free assistant http://bit.ly/Vpmaem.

What can I do for you? Want me to read you the agenda for this week?
Whats up? Want to organize an event and meet with friends?
What would you like me to do? Want me to go over your gmail inbox?
What do you feel like doing? Want to listen to some music?
Hey, are you up to date? Want me to read you some news?
How can I help you? Want me to go over your recent calls and see who you should get back to?
Going to %1$s? Want me to check traffic conditions?
Hey, do you text and drive? Want to try my new app to text by voice?
By the way, here is a new voice texting app from my creators. We work smoothly together - check it out!
